title: Gift of Magic Icon
body: Me and my friend gifted the champ to each other and we didnt got the gift of magic icon i dont understand why ?

replies.body: What Lew said!  There will be plenty of players eligible for the icon, so it may take a bit.  Hang tight, goodies will come!

The icons from the [promotional ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/champion-release/xayah-and-rakan-available-now-launch-promotions?utm_source=LeagueClient) event can take up to 2 weeks after it ends to get to your account.
I have not received it yet {{champion:497}} {{champion:498}}
The same thing happened to me.
i didnt either........ i did it days ago
